comment.body:
For the amp version of the site, if you add this rule:  `the-sun.com##.amp-adv-wrapper` then the adverts leftover will be hidden?
The top of the site on the full version is missing due to the Fanboy's Annoyances filter, please disable this filter or add:
`the-sun.com#@#.sticky-social` to the user rules.

I have inspected the packets using Wireshark and I found that:
there is missing domain (beat.yourtv.jp), and all telemetries except one were sent in plaintext.

![0A6EE658-7B29-46A6-993E-5CB5CF410AA7](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98938086/203982983-50052168-bb08-40fe-a98f-86ee15e0b455.jpeg)

The underlined DNS queries are all telemetry made by my smart TV. I also have Wireshark log which can be sent directly to you upon request. I decided not to upload it here because it contains my TVs identifies as well as postal code (although its fake).

comment.body:
This:
```adblock
t-online.de#%#(()=>{window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send=new Proxy(window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send,{apply:(a,b,c)=>{const d=b.urlCalled;return"string"!=typeof d||0===d.length?Reflect.apply(a,b,c):d.match(/\.damoh\./)?void 0:Reflect.apply(a,b,c)}})})();
```
seems to works on `t-online.de`, but it might be required to click two times on a player (I guess that it's better than ads).

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 36

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://truyenqqpro.com/truyen-tranh/sakurai-san-wa-kizuite-hoshii-8558-chap-10.html

AdGuard Base filter

_No response_
